author: jdcasey
msg: [SUREFIRE-828] Enable code to test for empty groups/excludedGroups strings, both for junit and testng. Also, minor corrections to the tests to get them running. Finally, shift the site-plugin configuration to a profile to keep it from interfering with snapshot building.

author: jdcasey
msg: [SUREFIRE-828] Fixing problems with missing empty-string check on groups/excludedGroups, especially in TestNG...this is the fixed code for TestNG, along with tests. The fix is disabled until I verify that the tests fail.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-3091: When running in SolrCloud mode, whether a instance is supposed to be part of the quorum or not, it tries to start a local Solr ZK server.
